id.description: The unique ID of the instance record; a UUID

hrid.description: The human readable ID, also called eye readable ID. A system-assigned sequential ID which maps to the Instance ID

source.description: The metadata source and its format of the underlying record to the instance record. (e.g. FOLIO if it's a record created in Inventory;  MARC if it's a MARC record created in MARCcat or EPKB if it's a record coming from eHoldings)

staffSuppress.description: Records the fact that the record should not be displayed for others than catalogers

discoverySuppress.description: Records the fact that the record should not be displayed in a discovery system
